headline: New device security partnerships for Cloudflare One
keywords: Zero Trust, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Device Security, Device posture, Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare One, Security Week, Security
description: Cloudflare launches new integrations with CrowdStrike, SentinelOne, and VMware Carbon Black. Cloudflare for Teams customers can now restrict access to their applications based on security signals from their devices.
